entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:40 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 9:40 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 1.
